title: System Developer within E-mobility
description:
Scania's R&D department is transforming to become part of TRATON Group R&D. TRATON is a group of strong brands with a shared mission: transforming transportation together to create the future of sustainable transport solutions. Within TRATON, we include MAN, Scania, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International. As part of a global team of industry experts, you get to think bigger, experience more, and reach further. Together, we have the power to transform transportation.
   

  

 Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 As a system developer your job is to drive and coordinate development, testing and management of the Electro Mechanical Power Takeoffs according to TRATON Product development process and its breakdown in terms of Embedded systems release process.
   

  

 You will also be responsible for user function development related to electrical power take-offs (PTO) in our battery electric vehicles (BEV). A user function is a complete functionality at the vehicle level viewed from the end-user perspective. It is designed to meet the needs of the end-users, and to enhance their user experience. This role involves collaboration with various departments and teams to ensure seamless integration and functionality of PTO solutions.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Supervise the integration of EMPTO systems into electric vehicles, ensuring smooth functionality and optimal performance.
* Safety and Security: Ensure the safety, security, and reliability of the system throughout its lifecycle.
* System Documentation: Maintain comprehensive and up-to-date documentation for all system components, processes, and standards.
* Support to Testing, Production & Aftermarket: Collaborate with testing teams to support system validation, and assist production and aftermarket teams with troubleshooting and issue resolution.
* Lifecycle Product Maintenance: Address field quality issues, ensuring the product remains operational throughout its lifecycle with continuous improvements and updates.
* Product Data Management: Manage and update product data, including systems such as OAS (Operational Assessment System).
* Development to Production to Aftermarket Support: Provide ongoing support across the full product life cycle, from development through to production and aftermarket services.


 You also:
   

  

 Develop user functions related to electrical power take-offs, ensuring they meet the needs of the users and align with Scania and TRATON’s needs.
   

  

 Collaborate with various departments and teams to ensure seamless integration and functionality of power take-offs.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You are probably some or all the following:
   

  

 A person who takes initiative and takes responsibility for your deliveries.
   

  

 A clear communicator.
   

  

 You are interested in how the vehicles work from a system perspective.
   

  

 You have 5+ years of experience in the automotive industry within system- or function development
   

  

 Some valuable skills and experiences that could help in the day-to-day work include:
   

  

 Electric vehicle related experience.
   

  

 Project Management and leadership skills.
   

  

 If you feel that you do not tick all of these boxes but still believe you would be a good fit for the role, please send in your application anyway! We believe that the right person is more important than the exact right experience.
   

  

 We welcome applicants from all backgrounds – your unique experience and perspectives is valuable to us.
   

  

**This Is Us**
 You will become part of a team of 16 people with the plan to grow during the year. We are responsible for developing the charging system and user functions related to charging and electrical power take-offs. Your future colleagues come from all over the world - leading to a very diverse and global work context. Everything we do is focused on electrification and developing solutions for sustainable transport solutions!
   

  

 As a manager I believe in creating value together as a strong and high performing team. Magic does not happen behind a screen in a virtual meeting, but rather at the coffee machine in a fika-break between the meetings. I love seeing people working together to solve complex issues, and I think I have done so since I was young and played a lot of different sports - where being part of a team has always been the common denominator in what I have chosen to do in my free time.
   

  

 Within TRATON Group R&D, you are an important part of something bigger. Joining us means gaining access to the ins and outs of the entire transportation industry. As part of a global team of industry experts, you get to think bigger, experience more, and reach further. Being bigger also means being stronger. Together with our brands, we have the collective power to transform transportation.
   

  

**We Offer**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, TRATON Group R&D supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include wellness allowance, TRATON result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. We also host events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-11-15. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact:
   

  

 Johanna Lehander, Unit manager, johanna.lehander@scania.com
   

  

 We look forward to your application!

title: Examensarbete, 30 hp: Beskärning av neurala nätverk
description:
*Är du en student som är ivrig att tillämpa dina teoretiska kunskaper och nya perspektiv på verkliga utmaningar? På Saab tror vi att innovationer växer på nya idéer, och ditt examensarbete kan vara gnistan som tänder vårt nästa tekniska genombrott.*
 Din roll
   

  

 Vi ser det enorma värdet som studenter tillför vårt företag. Din akademiska precision, i kombination med din entusiasm för avancerad teknik, gör att du kan närma dig problem med en unik och insiktsfull lins. På Saab får du möjlighet att samarbeta med erfarna ingenjörer och specialister, få ovärderlig praktisk erfarenhet och samtidigt bidra till vår tillväxt och utveckling.
   

  

**Bakgrund**
 Det är väl dokumenterat att neurala nätverk har ett överskott av parametrar och att endast en delmängd av dessa är avgörande för korrekt prediktion. Modellbeskärning är en intuitiv metod för modellkomprimering där vikter med lågt inflytande på resultatet avlägsnas. Detta minskar både modellstorleken och reducerar modellens inferenstid.
   

  

 Olika beskärningsmetoder existerar för att på effektivast sätt minska modellstorleken utan att påverka resultatet negativt. Vi vill undersöka flera av dessa metoder och skapa ett effektivt verktyg för modellbeskärning.
   

  

**Beskrivning av examensarbetet**
 Examensarbetet syftar till att undersöka och implementera olika tekniker för beskärning av neurala nätverk. Detta innebär en mindre initial litteraturstudie om de tekniker som finns inom litteraturen för effektiv modellbeskärning. Arbetet kommer sedan att fokusera på att implementera och jämföra olika tekniker och studera hur beskärningsandelen påverkar en modells resultat och inferenstid.
   

  

 I mån av tid kommer resultatet byggas ihop till ett verktyg där användaren antingen kan ange en procentsats av hur mycket en modell ska beskäras alternativs ange en accepterad resultatförlust där maximal beskärning genomförs fram tills resultatförlusten är nådd.
   

  

 Du kommer arbeta i vår nystartade verksamhet i Solna. Har fokuserar vi på obemannade system vilket innebär ett fokus på teknikområden som krävs för att leda, navigera och styra obemannade system. Främst då flygande sådana.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Arbetet är lämpligt för 1–2 studenter i slutet av er teknisk fysik- eller datorteknik-utbildning (eller motsvarande) och ska påbörja ert 30 hp examensarbete. Erfarenheter inom maskinlärning och programmering är meriterande.
   

  

 Vi ger dig det stöd och den vägledning du behöver för att omsätta dina teoretiska kunskaper i praktiska lösningar. Bli en drivande kraft bakom Saabs tekniska framsteg!
   

  

*Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.*
 Vad du blir en del av
   

  

 Upptäck oändliga möjligheter. Anta utmaningar, skapa smarta innovationer och uppgradera dina förmågor. Det här är en plats för kluriga tänkare, modiga pionjärer och alla däremellan. Tillsammans uppnår vi det extraordinära, var och en tar med sitt unika perspektiv. Varje bidrag räknas.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 26 100 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här.
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdag**
 30-11-2025
   

  

**Kontaktperson**
 Anders Gustafsson, Chef
   

  

 anders.gustafsson3@saabgroup.com
   

  

 0734-378902

title: Java Developers X 4
description:
emagine is looking for 4 Java Developers for our client that is undergoing a strategic transformation in its mutual fund order execution process. As part of this initiative, the client is transitioning to a new external partner responsible for executing mutual fund orders in external funds for customers across Sweden, Norway, and Finland.
   

  

 In parallel, the client is rebuilding its IT infrastructure to support this new operational model. The current solution is based on outdated technologies, including legacy Java versions, SOAP web services, and obsolete frontend frameworks.
   

  

**Start: 2026-01-05**
**End: 2027-01-31**
**Location: Stockholm, onsite min 3 days/week**
 The objective of this consultancy assignment is to support the development and implementation of a modern, scalable, and efficient IT solution for mutual fund order processing. This includes backend services, frontend applications, integration layers, and automated testing frameworks.
   

  

**Scope of Work**
**Backend Development**
* Develop microservices using Java 21 and Spring Boot
* Design and manage relational databases using PostgreSQL and Microsoft SQL Server
* Implement messaging protocols such as Kafka, JMS, and MQ
* Develop and consume APIs using OpenAPI and AsyncAPI


**Frontend Development**
* Build responsive and user-friendly interfaces using React


**Integration**
* Migrate from SOAP to RESTful APIs
* Implement event-driven architecture using Kafka


**Test Automation**
* Develop automated test suites using JUnit and Cucumber
* Integrate testing into CI/CD pipelines


**Required Skills & Experience**
* Strong proficiency in Java 21+ and related frameworks (Spring, Hibernate)
* Experience with relational databases and SQL (PostgreSQL, Snowflake,
* Knowledge of OpenAPI and AsyncAPI specifications
* Familiarity with version control systems (Git) and CI/CD pipelines
* Solid understanding of software design patterns and object-oriented programming principles

title: Testingenjör, Mjukvara - Robotic Milking
description:
**Testingenjör, Mjukvara – Robotic Milking**
 Vill du vara med och utveckla teknik som gör skillnad – för både människor och djur?
   

  

 DeLaval är den största utvecklaren, tillverkaren och leverantören av lösningar för mjölkproduktion globalt
   

  

 Vi söker nu mjukvarutestare till våra utvecklingsteam inom robotmjölkning – – i en miljö där teknik, hållbarhet och samarbete står i centrum.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som mjukvarutestare blir du en viktig del av avdelningen Robotic Milking, där vi utvecklar automatiska mjölkningssystem. Du ansvarar för testning inom ditt team – både automatiska och manuella tester och bidrar till att förbättra våra testmetoder och simuleringsverktyg.
   

  

 Du arbetar nära utvecklare och andra testare, och har många kontaktytor inom hela DeLaval. Vi tror på tvärfunktionellt samarbete och att olika perspektiv leder till bättre lösningar.
   

  

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter**
* Utveckla och förbättra testmiljöer med simulatorer och automatiska tester
* Delta i strategiarbete kring testmetoder och planering
* Samarbeta med utvecklare och testingenjörer för att samordna behov och idéer
* Granska krav och specifikationer ur ett testbarhetsperspektiv
* Samla in, visualisera och kommunicera testresultat
* Utföra tester på olika nivåer, dokumentera avvikelser och bidra till kvalitetsförbättringar


**Kvalifikationer**
* Relevant högskole-/universitetsutbildning.
* Minst tre års erfarenhet av mjukvarutestning
* Erfarenhet av att skapa automatiska testfall
* Kunskap i Java, C++, phyton eller C
* Erfarenhet av Linux
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och/eller engelska, både i tal och skrift
* Stort intresse för testutveckling och teknik.
* Nyfiken, kommunikativ och gillar att samarbeta.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt, sätta kvalitetsmål och bidra med din kompetens till teamet.
* Tålamod och drivkraft – egenskaper som gör dig till en viktig del av DeLavals fortsatta framgång.


**Jobba på DeLaval**
* En inkluderande arbetsmiljö där mångfald ses som en styrka
* Möjlighet till kompetensutveckling och karriärvägar
* Flexibla arbetssätt och balans mellan arbete och privatliv
* Ett meningsfullt arbete där du bidrar till hållbar mjölkproduktion
* Flexibla arbetstider och arbetstidsförkortning
* 30 dagars semester
* Friskvårdsbidrag på 4 000 kr/år
* Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring
* Tjänstepension och arbetsrelaterad olycksfallsförsäkring


**Övrig information**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med placering vid DeLavals huvudkontor i Tumba, söder om Stockholm. Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande. . Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via e-post.
   

  

**Kontakt**
 Rekryterande chef: Kattis Karttunen, kattis.karttunen@delaval.com
   

  

 Rekryterare: Agnes Edbom , agnes.edbom@delaval.com
   

  

**Om DeLaval**
 Vår vision är att göra hållbar livsmedelsproduktion möjlig.
   

  

 Som ett företag byggt på innovation arbetar vi ständigt med att hitta sätt att hjälpa våra kunder – mjölkbönder – att göra mer med mindre, genom att erbjuda världsledande mjölkningsutrustning och lösningar.
   

  

 Idag har DeLaval cirka 4 500 engagerade medarbetare som verkar i över 100 marknader världen över. DeLaval är en del av Tetra Laval-koncernen. Läs mer på corporate.delaval.com.

title: Senior Developer till Kleer
description:
**💛 It all comes Kleer – PE Accounting byter namn**
 Kleer (tidigare PE Accounting) grundades för att revolutionera ekonomi- och lönebranschen genom ledande teknik och ekonomiexpertis. Idag erbjuder vi marknadens mest automatiserade system med över 80% automationsgrad, men vi stannar inte där – vi vill mer. Vi blir Kleer!
   

  

**Vill du vara med på resan? Blir en del av vårt team som senior utvecklare!**
 👉🏼 Hos oss blir du en del av ett starkt team av engagerade utvecklare vars dagliga arbete & åsikter är avgörande för bolagets fortsatta tillväxt. Som utvecklare på Kleer arbetar du i en helt egenutvecklad produkt, som vi utvecklar och produktionssätter och du får stor kreativ frihet och möjligheter att ständigt växa i rollen som utvecklare på Kleer! Läs gärna mer om oss på vår karriärsida
   

  

**Vår Utvecklingsmiljö**
 Vi är ett produktbolag med en modern, agil utvecklingsprocess där teamen själva sätter sina milstolpar och sköter prioriteringen utifrån uppsatta affärsmål. Vi tror starkt på att det är roligare att arbeta om man förstår användarnas behov och ser utmaningar och möjligheter. Därför arbetar varje squad med en del av applikationen, men i hela teknikstacken. Vårt inhouse-utvecklingsteam består idag av utvecklare fördelat på 5 team, där teamen samarbetar nära en dedikerad produktägare.
   

  

 Kodbasen, som till största del är skriven i Java, är välskriven och vi kvalitetssäkrar vår kod genom automatiserade tester. Vi uppgraderar löpande till senaste versionen av våra verktyg och tredjepartskomponenter. Hela miljön är containerbaserad och releaser görs veckovis.
   

  

 Vi har ett helt nytt, fräscht och påkostat kontor i centrala Stockholm (Fleminggatan 14) där vi möts, tar en pingismatch, utbyter idéer och samlas runt en whiteboard eller för ett retrospective. Vi vet att även flexibilitet i vardagen är viktigt, därför finns det även möjligheten att arbeta hybrid!
   

  

**Rollen Som Senior Developer På Kleer**
 Som Senior Developer hos oss kommer du att spela en viktig roll i att utveckla och förbättra vår produkt samt bidra till företagets tekniska resa framåt. Vi tror att du trivs i ett modernt produktbolag och i en roll där du får chans att verkligen vara med och påverka produkten och utvecklingen av den.
   

  

 Dina ansvarsområden i rollen 👇🏼
   

  

* Delta i hela utvecklingscykeln – från kravspecifikation till implementering
* Samarbeta nära Product Owner, Engineering Manager och teammedlemmar för att säkerställa att produktens vision och tekniska mål uppnås
* Ett tekniskt ansvar för en del av applikationen när det kommer till datamodell, arkitektur, prestanda, säkerhet m.m.
* Bidra med din tekniska expertis och erfarenhet för att kontinuerligt förbättra våra utvecklingsprocesser


**Vem är du?**
 Vi tror att du har flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet av Java samt SQL och du är inte rädd för att komma med egna tankar och idéer som vi tillsammans förverkligar! Du talar och skriver svenska obehindrat. Som person är du nyfiken och motiveras av att testa och lära dig nya saker inom ditt område.
   

  

**Mer Om Kleer Som Bolag**
 Vi grundades 2011 och är ett modernt & värderingsstyrt produktbolag. I över 12 år har vi skapat innovation och hjälpt små & medelstora bolag att automatisera sin ekonomi. Vi har en väldigt stabil affärsmodell som bolag och växer organiskt, med sunda finanser - vilket bland annat har gjort oss till sexfaldiga DI Gaseller. I skrivande stund närmar vi oss 200 kollegor och finns med kontor i centrala Stockholm, Göteborg & Malmö.
   

  

*Vi ser verkligen fram emot att höra ifrån dig!*
 Vi genomför bakgrundskontroller i slutskedet av våra rekryteringsprocesser.
   

  

*Sökord: Java 19, Spring, Docker, REST, Linux, MySQL, Microservices, IntelliJ, Jenkins, Git, Remix. Fullstack, Backend, Produktbolag.*
 Vi på Kleer ändrar sättet världen ser på ekonomi- och lönehantering!
   

  

 Vårt automatiserade system, i kombination med vår tjänsteleverans bildar tillsammans en helhetslösning som ger våra kunder möjligheten att outsourca sin ekonomifunktion, och samtidigt behålla 100% kontroll - i realtid.
   

  

 Vi har en stabil affärsmodell, där över 90% av intäkterna är prenumerationsbaserade. Tillväxten har skett organiskt och med sunda finanser. Vi har fått utmärkelsen DI Gasell sex år i rad och är ett värderingsstyrt bolag med stort fokus på glädje, ansvar, prestigelöshet och nyfikenhet!

title: SEEBURGER BIS Platform Developer
description:
**SEEBURGER BIS Platform Developer** 




  





 My client is looking for

title: Specialized Sales Representative
description:
### **Job Applicant Privacy Notice**


**Specialized Sales Representative**
====================================

Publication Date: Oct 30, 2025
Ref. No: 529514
Location:
Linkoping, SE
**About Atos Group**

  



Atos Group is a global leader in digital transformation with c. 70,000 employees and annual revenue of c. € 10 billion, operating in 67 countries under two brands — Atos for services and Eviden for products. European number one in cybersecurity, cloud and high-performance computing, Atos Group is committed to a secure and decarbonized future and provides tailored AI-powered, end-to-end solutions for all industries. Atos is a SE (Societas Europaea) and listed on Euronext Paris.

  



The purpose of Atos is to help design the future of the information space. Its expertise and services support the development of knowledge, education and research in a multicultural approach and contribute to the development of scientific and technological excellence. Across the world, the Group enables its customers and employees, and members of societies at large to live, work and develop sustainably, in a safe and secure information space.

  


**Position overview:**

  



Atos Group is the largest Siemens software reseller in the Nordics. We have built our expertise spanning nearly 30 years in the industry and have a strong team of experts in Scandinavia and the Baltics. Siemens's partnership is a strategic choice for us. We are at the forefront of digital transformation and cloud services, and we are seeking Sales Specialists for our Manufacturing Center of Excellence in the Nordics.



Your mission: As a Sales Executive, you will join our Siemens Digital Industries Software sales team and focus on selling Siemens software and services to industrial clients in the region. Your goal is to position Siemens Digital Industries Software as the preferred technology and Atos as a trusted advisor in PLM, MOM, and Product/Production Simulation areas. The primary goal is to support the Swedish business by developing a pipeline for new business opportunities and expanding solutions for both new and existing customers.

  


**As a key contributor to our growth in the Nordics, your responsibilities include:**

  


* Strategize and penetrate accounts with a focus on Siemens Digital Industries Software portfolio and you will be working with highly skilled professionals working in SAP, digital security, smart platforms, and manufacturing domains.
* Accrue and deploy customer insights, driving business transformation and reducing customer costs and risks.
* Lead with product and industry insights, best practices, and compelling business cases, establishing Eviden as a tier 1 industry partner and a trusted advisor.
* Manage customer relationships with integrity, driving satisfaction and positioning Eviden as a leader in innovation and service delivery.
* Leverage your existing network to land new customers in our Siemens Digital Industries Software offerings.
* Build a broad influential network amongst your clients to create additional opportunities to expand our footprint in the accounts.
* Engage prospects and provide strategic recommendations that position our products and services to advance the customer’s strategic initiatives and deliver mutual value.
* Work closely with marketing to improve our position in the market and harness your digital sales and marketing skills to drive new sales leads.
* Build and own your sales territory plan and execute the plan by leading our pre-sales consultants and marketing team.

  


**Qualifications:**

  


* Passion for industrial digitalization and experience and understanding of industrial value chain.
* 5+ years of experience in enterprise software sales, sales enablement, business development, software industry operations
* Experience in value-based sales methodologies
* Proven track record of success in selling complex technical software solutions and building strong qualified pipeline in systematic way.
* Skill in identifying key stakeholders and decision-makers, establishing long-term relationships of trust, credibility, and respect.
* Strong work ethic: Team player, self-starter, high energy, and results oriented.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in English, both verbal and written, is mandatory. A fluent local language (Swedish) is a must.

  


**What we offer:**

  


* A role in a unique technology powerhouse with a strong local and global presence and a commitment to driving sustainability and environmental programs.
* Opportunities for growth within a company that values learning, agility, and customer obsession.
* You will have a unique opportunity to witness heavy business expansion and you are essential contributor for the growth.

  



Here at Atos, diversity and inclusion are embedded in our DNA. Read more about our commitment to a fair work environment for all.

  



Atos is a recognized leader in its industry across Environment, Social and Governance (ESG) criteria. Find out more on our CSR commitment.

  

**Choose your future. Choose Atos.**

title: Senior Enterprise Account Executive - Sweden
description:
Harness is a high-growth company that is disrupting the software delivery market. Our mission is to enable the 30 million software developers in the world to deliver code to their users reliably, efficiently, securely and quickly, increasing customers’ pace of innovation while improving the developer experience. We offer solutions for every step of the software delivery lifecycle to build, test, secure, deploy and manage reliability, feature flags and cloud costs. The Harness Software Delivery Platform includes modules for CI, CD, Cloud Cost Management, Feature Flags, Service Reliability Management, Security Testing Orchestration, Chaos Engineering, Software Engineering Insights and continues to expand at an incredibly fast pace.

Harness is led by technologist and entrepreneur Jyoti Bansal, who founded AppDynamics and sold it to Cisco for $3.7B. We’re backed with $425M in venture financing from top-tier VC and strategic firms, including J.P. Morgan, Capital One Ventures, Citi Ventures, ServiceNow, Splunk Ventures, Norwest Venture Partners, Adage Capital Partners, Balyasny Asset Management, Gaingels, Harmonic Growth Partners, Menlo Ventures, IVP, Unusual Ventures, GV (formerly Google Ventures), Alkeon Capital, Battery Ventures, Sorenson Capital, Thomvest Ventures and Silicon Valley Bank.

**Position Summary**

Harness is looking for sales champions and leaders who are as passionate about building the next great software company as they are about blowing out their numbers every quarter.

**About the Role**
* Exceeding your number- Winning new enterprise logos
* Forecasting correctly, communicating clearly, aligning brilliantly with the rest of the team
* Not being afraid of being data driven - including using Salesforce and other tools to track your progress
* Managing full sales cycle from prospect to close
* Collaborating with other teams, including sales engineering and sales development
**About You**
* A proven track record of driving and closing enterprise deals
* Account planning and execution skills
* Ability to sell C-Level and across both IT and business units
* Consistent overachievement of quota and revenue goals with a strong W2 track record
* Understands the value of utilizing a strong sales methodology such as MEDDPIC when building pipeline and qualifying opportunities
* Proven consultative sales solution skills, including the ability to articulate a clear, concise return on investment value statement
* Ability to maintain a high level of productivity, manage multiple competing priorities, and work effectively under the pressure of time constraints in a fast-paced, complex, collaborative, and team-oriented environment
* Bachelors Degree or equivalent
### **Work Location**



The role will be Remote in Sweden.


**What You Will Have at Harness**


* Competitive salary
* Comprehensive healthcare benefits
* Flexible work schedule
* Paid Time Off and Parental Leave
* Monthly, quarterly, and annual social and team building events
* Monthly internet reimbursement
* Quarterly Harness TGIF-Off / 4 days
  




### **Harness In The News:**



All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex or national origin.

  

**Note on Fraudulent Recruiting/Offers**



We have become aware that there may be fraudulent recruiting attempts being made by people posing as representatives of Harness. These scams may involve fake job postings, unsolicited emails, or messages claiming to be from our recruiters or hiring managers.



Please note, we do not ask for sensitive or financial information via chat, text, or social media, and any email communications will come from the domain @harness.io. Additionally, Harness will never ask for any payment, fee to be paid, or purchases to be made by a job applicant. All applicants are encouraged to apply directly to our open jobs via our website. Interviews are generally conducted via Zoom video conference unless the candidate requests other accommodations.



If you believe that you have been the target of an interview/offer scam by someone posing as a representative of Harness, please do not provide any personal or financial information and contact us immediately at . You can also find additional information about this type of scam and report any fraudulent employment offers via the Federal Trade Commission’s website (, or you can contact your local law enforcement agency.

title: Service Manager Cloud Platforms
description:
Vill du ta en nyckelroll i ett företag som satsar på digital utveckling, hållbarhet och kvalitet och där du får vara med och forma framtidens molnstrategi? Vi söker nu en Service Manager Cloud Platforms som vill ta ansvar för att leda, förvalta och vidareutveckla vår molninfrastruktur med fokus på Microsoft Azure.


**Om tjänsten**  

Som Service Manager Cloud Platforms hos oss får du en bred och varierad roll där du både arbetar strategiskt och operativt. Du blir en central del av vår digitala resa med uppdraget att säkerställa att vår molnplattform är stabil, kostnadseffektiv och redo att stötta företagets affärsmål.


Du ansvarar för planering, drift, utveckling och kostnadsoptimering av våra molntjänster och är länken mellan IT, verksamhet och våra externa leverantörer. Rollen är ny, vilket ger dig möjligheter att påverka, bygga strukturer, etablera förvaltningsmodell för området och sätta din prägel på hur vi arbetar med molntjänster framöver.


Du tilldelas ansvaret som tjänsteägare och arbetar proaktivt med att driva och följa upp initiativ som syftar till att optimera Cloud Platforms. Detta gör du i nära dialog och samverkan med olika intressenter för att omvandla funktionskrav till IT leveranser. Målbilden är att underlätta för våra medarbetare i deras vardag och ge dem rätt verktyg för att kunna hantera morgondagens utmaningar.


Rollen agerar brygga mellan verksamheten och leverantörerna, där du säkerställer att kommunikationen och samarbetet mellan parterna är transparent och produktiv. Genom att hålla dig uppdaterad med tekniska trender hoppas vi att du har en stark drivkraft och intresse av att ta fram Business Case med förslag på nya funktioner där du motiverar lösningar som kan skapa affärsnytta.


**Din profil**  

För att lyckas i rollen söker vi dig som har:


* Erfarenhet av att arbeta aktivt med molnplattformar, främst inom Microsoft Azure, i en roll som exempelvis konsult, produktchef eller försäljningsingenjör inom cloud.
* Minst tre års erfarenhet av arbete i Azure-miljöer – gärna med inslag av FinOps eller kostnadsoptimering.
* En modern syn på IT-drift, där molnet är självklart och traditionell on-prem-lagring inte längre står i fokus.
* Förmåga att kombinera strategiskt tänkande med praktiskt genomförande – du kan både planera och driva förbättringar i molnmiljöer.
* God kommunikationsförmåga och vana att samarbeta med såväl tekniska team som verksamhetsrepresentanter.


Vi ser gärna att du har akademisk utbildning inom relevant område (t.ex. IT, systemvetenskap eller teknik). Kunskap inom ITIL och informationssäkerhet är meriterande.


Vi betonar betydelsen av dina personliga egenskaper och söker en engagerad, positiv och driven individ som inte bara ser utmaningar, utan också möjligheter till lösningar. Du trivs i en samarbetskultur och är social och ödmjuk i ditt förhållningssätt till arbete och kollegor. Att kunna konkretisera krav till lösningar och samordna tvärfunktionella samarbetspartners är en del som motiverar dig. Din goda kommunikativa förmåga gör att du enkelt kan samarbeta med andra och du har lätt för att förklara komplexa tekniska termer på ett lättförståeligt sätt. Du trivs att arbeta i en miljö där förändringar och utveckling är en naturlig del av vardagen.


**Vi erbjuder**  

Vi erbjuder dig ett arbete hos Nordens ledande bostadsutvecklare. Med god lönsamhet har vi varit drivande i att utveckla bostadsmarknaden sedan 1945. En nyckel till framgång är vårt strukturerade arbetssätt som vi etablerat och utvecklat sedan många år tillbaka. Här behöver du inte uppfinna hjulet, men du blir en viktig del i att ständigt utveckla det. Här finns förutsättningarna för dig att växa både i din yrkesroll och i din kompetens.


Hos oss är du med och påverkar hur framtidens samhällen utformas. Här värdesätter vi din kompetens och ditt bidrag och vi arbetar långsiktigt för att främja jämställdhet och mångfald. Vi bidrar till ett samhälle där människors lika värde står i centrum och där olikheter ses som en styrka. Med människan i fokus, ett inbyggt långsiktigt hållbarhetsarbete och genom ständig utveckling skapar vi boenden och livsmiljöer som lägger grunden till ett bättre liv.


Här på JM är du del av ett team, där din kompetens och ditt bidrag är viktigt för att vi ska fortsätta leverera och bli bättre.


**Ansökan och kontakt**  

I denna rekrytering samarbetar JM med Level Recruitment. Vänligen sök tjänsten genom att klicka här: Service Manager Cloud Platforms


Vid frågor vänligen kontakta Senior Rekryteringskonsult Lynn Sjöberg Westander på 08-120 50 431 eller Susanna Hörler på 08-120 50 420. Urvalet av ansökningar sker löpande


Vill du vara med och forma framtidens samhällen? Välkommen att söka dig till JM - här kan du göra skillnad på riktigt.

title: Penetration Tester to Accenture Security
description:
**Accenture Security** is seeking driven professionals with a strong commitment to IT security to join our team as a **Penetration Tester.** In this pivotal role, you will spearhead comprehensive security assessments to identify and address vulnerabilities across diverse technologies, from applications and networks to leading cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, and Azure.

  

At Accenture, you will be part of a collaborative, innovative environment dedicated to advancing security practices and empowering organizations to stay ahead of emerging threats.

  

If you are eager to advance your career with a global leader in cybersecurity and play a pivotal role in shaping the future of the industry, this position offers the unique opportunity to collaborate closely with our dedicated penetration testing team in Stockholm, as well as engage with colleagues and experts across our international network – this might be a perfect opportunity for you.


  

We’re looking for someone who lives and breathes IT security, with a particular passion for penetration testing. If you enjoy breaking things to make them better, this might be your next gig.

* **3+ years** of hands-on experience running and owning penetration tests from start to finish.
* Comprehensive expertise in **application and web application security testing**, including familiarity with the **OWASP Top 10**. Proficient in infrastructure domains such as Windows Active Directory, Linux systems, and network security.
* Demonstrated experience with leading cloud platforms including **AWS, GCP, and Azure.**
* **Fluent in both Swedish and English,** with strong written and verbal communication skills in each language.

### **Bonus points if you bring:**

* Solid experience in software development, AWS-native architectures, IaaS, or containerized microservices.
* Familiarity with the latest buzzwords that actually matter — because our clients use them too.
* Certifications like OSCP or other relevant security creds.

**As a Penetration Tester with us**, you're not just technically sharp — you also know how to communicate and share your knowledge with both clients and colleagues. You're a natural source of inspiration, constantly exploring new technologies and pushing your passion for security forward.

**We don’t expect perfection**—but we do expect a growth mindset. Everyone on our team is committed to evolving, so we can stay one step ahead of attackers and keep our clients secure. If you're like us, you see the value and energy in working together to solve complex challenges.

**What we offer**
-----------------

### **Events & Community**

* Team kickoffs and spontaneous after-work hangouts.
* Access to a wide variety of training and certification programs, including virtual and in-person courses tailored to professional and technical development.
* A culture of collaboration and curiosity, where knowledge-sharing is second nature.

### **Benefits That Back You Up**

* Choose your gear: PC, Mac or Linux.
* Private health insurance, life & accident coverage, and travel insurance.
* 5,000 SEK/year wellness allowance.
* Accenture IF offers possible activities and sports for all our employees.

### **Flexibility**

* Hybrid work model.
* Flexible hours to match your rhythm.

**How to Apply**
----------------


Ready to join our team? We’d love to hear from you! Simply submit your application in English to take the next step in your career journey with us. If you have any questions, please reach out to responsible recruiter: michelle.nilsson@accenture.com. We look forward to connecting with you!
company_description: Our 721,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success.

title: Software QA Test Engineer
description:
In an increasingly connected world, the pandemic has highlighted just how essential telecom networks are to keeping society running. The **Network Infrastructure** group is at the heart of a revolution to connectivity, pushing the boundaries to deliver more and faster network capacity to people worldwide through our ambition, innovation, and technical expertise


Join **Optical Networks division** , where innovation meets scale in the AI-driven data center era. With the recent acquisition of Infinera, we’ve united two industry leaders to create an optical networking powerhouse—combining cutting-edge technology with proven leadership to redefine the future of connectivity.


Infinera is now part of the Nokia Corporation and its subsidiaries. When you apply, the information you share will be handled with care and used only for recruitment purposes within the group.


As a Software QA Engineer at Nokia, you'll play a crucial role in ensuring the quality of our cutting-edge communication technology. You will design and execute automated test cases using Python, collaborating closely with a cross-functional team of developers and product managers during sprint planning and backlog refinements. You'll write detailed reports on test execution and defect analysis, enabling swift issue resolution. You’ll thrive in our dynamic Agile environment, working alongside passionate colleagues who are committed to innovation in optical communications. Your strong communication skills will empower you to collaborate effectively within our global team, driving quality and efficiency in our products.


  
* Design and implement comprehensive test plans, creating and executing automated test cases in Python to meet project specifications.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional software development teams during backlog refinement and sprint planning, ensuring alignment on project goals.
* Generate detailed reports on test execution and defect analysis, improving the reproducibility and resolution of issues to enhance product quality.
* Participate in continuous improvement discussions to promote the adoption of innovative approaches in quality assurance and testing.
* Utilize and integrate version control systems like Git to maintain test scripts and documentation effectively within the agile development workflow.
* Stay updated on optical communication technologies and contribute insights to enhance the team’s approach to testing and quality assurance.

  
* 5+ years of hands-on experience in automated test development using Python;
* Strong knowledge of optical communication and related technologies;
* Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field;
* Proven knowledge in Agile methodologies and Test Driven Development;
* Effective communication skills for global cross-functional collaboration;

It would be nice if you also had:


* Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git)
* ISTQB or other software testing certifications

  
**Come create the technology that helps the world act together**  

  

Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people’s lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world.
  

We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work
  

  

**What we offer**  

  

Nokia offers continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered.
  

  

**Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer**  

  

Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality:  

  



* One of the World’s Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere
* Gender-Equality Index by Bloomberg
Workplace Pride Global Benchmark  
* 

  

At Nokia, we act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people. Nokia’s employment decisions are made regardless of race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.
  

We are committed to a culture of inclusion built upon our core value of respect.  

  

  

Join us and be part of a company where you will feel included and empowered to succeed.
company_description: Join Nokia and help create the technology that helps the world act together.

title: Data Center Technician
description:
Overview
  
As a Microsoft Datacenter Technician (DCT), you will play a vital role in the heart of Microsoft’s global cloud infrastructure. In this hands-on technical position, you will be responsible for staging, installing, configuring, and deploying hardware within our data centers. You will perform essential diagnostics, troubleshooting, and repairs on servers and network equipment, ensuring that our infrastructure runs efficiently, securely, and reliably. You will also execute hardware decommissions and refresh cycles, following detailed Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) to maintain operational excellence and data security.
  
This position offers a unique opportunity to deepen your understanding of data center operations, hardware lifecycle management, and enterprise-scale technology environments. You will gain experience in structured cabling, server architecture, and rack configuration while learning how to monitor, maintain, and optimize large-scale computing systems. As a DCT, you will also have the opportunity to develop your mentoring and leadership skills by guiding peers and collaborating across teams to solve complex problems. This role serves as a strong foundation for advancing your career in IT infrastructure, cloud engineering, or data center management.
  
About Microsoft Cloud Operations & Innovation (CO+I)
  
Microsoft’s Cloud Operations & Innovation (CO+I) organization powers the engine that delivers all Microsoft online services, including Bing, Office 365, Xbox, OneDrive, and Azure. CO+I is responsible for the planning, delivery, and operation of our data centers across the globe. These facilities form the foundation of Microsoft’s cloud, hosting millions of servers that support services for over one billion customers and more than 20 million businesses in more than 90 countries.
  
Our portfolio includes over 200 data centers in 32 countries, forming one of the largest and most advanced cloud infrastructures in the world. CO+I is dedicated to continuous innovation in design, construction, and operations to ensure Microsoft remains a world leader in cloud technology. The organization places a strong emphasis on employee development, offering numerous opportunities for professional growth through Career Rotation Programs, Diversity & Inclusion initiatives, certification support, and specialized technical training.
  
At Microsoft, sustainability and efficiency are key priorities. Our teams are committed to reducing environmental impact, improving energy efficiency, and advancing sustainable operations across all facilities. By joining CO+I, you’ll be contributing to Microsoft’s mission of creating a more sustainable and accessible cloud infrastructure for the future.
  
Responsibilities
  
  

**As a Microsoft Datacenter Technician, you will:**  

Deploy and maintain hardware infrastructure by racking, stacking, and cabling servers and networking equipment in accordance with Microsoft’s detailed safety and quality standards.
  
Perform diagnostics and troubleshooting to quickly identify the root causes of issues, replace faulty components, and restore service with minimal disruption to customers and business operations.
  
Conduct post-execution verification to ensure that grounding, labeling, and cabling meet safety, design, and operational requirements, maintaining compliance with planned Network Design Tasks (NDTs).
  
Execute hardware decommissions and refreshes, including component upgrades, rebuilds, and migrations, following approved procedures to ensure data integrity and asset accountability.
  
Collaborate with escalation and engineering teams to resolve complex incidents, document findings, and contribute to long-term improvements in operational efficiency.
  
Follow established communication and escalation protocols, reporting incidents and progress to Data Center Operations management, Technician Leads, and other stakeholders in a timely and accurate manner.
  
Participate in on-the-job training and complete all required certifications aligned with your role. Observe senior technicians to build proficiency in new technologies, maintenance procedures, and Microsoft’s operational frameworks.
  
Support a collaborative team culture by sharing knowledge, participating in regular team meetings, and contributing to process improvements that enhance data center performance and safety.
  
  

Adhere to security and compliance standards, ensuring that all operations maintain strict confidentiality and integrity of Microsoft and customer data.
  
  

Professional Development and Growth
  
Microsoft invests deeply in the growth of its employees. As a DCT, you will have access to structured career pathways and training programs that prepare you for roles such as Lead Technician, Data Center Engineer, or Operations Manager. You’ll gain hands-on experience with cutting-edge hardware technologies, learn from global experts, and work in an environment that values curiosity, collaboration, and innovation.
  
You will also participate in ongoing education around Microsoft’s diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives, and take part in events and community engagements that support an inclusive and supportive workplace culture.
  
Qualifications
  
Required Qualifications
  
High school diploma, GED, or equivalent education.
  
Basic knowledge of computer hardware components, such as memory, storage devices, CPUs, and networking equipment.
  
Experience supporting IT hardware, troubleshooting issues, or maintaining related technology systems in a data center, IT support, or technical repair environment.
  
  

Background Check Requirements
  
This role requires the ability to meet Microsoft, customer, and/or government security screening requirements.
  
  

**These include, but are not limited to:**  

**Microsoft Cloud Background Check:** Must be successfully completed upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.
  
  

Preferred Qualifications
  
Previous experience in a data center, enterprise IT support, or hardware deployment environment.
  
Technical certifications such as CompTIA A+, Server+, Network+, or Basic Structured Cabling (BSC).
  
Familiarity with hardware lifecycle management, inventory control, and ticketing or workflow management systems.
  
Strong teamwork, communication, and organizational skills with the ability to work effectively under minimal supervision.
  
A passion for technology, continuous learning, and delivering high-quality results in a fast-paced, mission-critical environment.

title: Senior Customer Success Manager
description:
**About Workato**
=================



Workato transforms technology complexity into business opportunity. As the leader in enterprise orchestration, Workato helps businesses globally streamline operations by connecting data, processes, applications, and experiences. Its AI-powered platform enables teams to navigate complex workflows in real-time, driving efficiency and agility.



Trusted by a community of 400,000 global customers, Workato empowers organizations of every size to unlock new value and lead in today's fast-changing world. Learn how Workato helps businesses of all sizes achieve more at workato.com.


**Why join us?**
================



Ultimately, Workato believes in fostering a **flexible, trust-oriented culture that empowers everyone to take full ownership of their roles**. We are driven by **innovation** and looking for **team players** who want to actively build our company.



But, we also believe in **balancing productivity with self-care**. That's why we offer all of our employees a vibrant and dynamic work environment along with a multitude of benefits they can enjoy inside and outside of their work lives.



If this sounds right up your alley, please submit an application. We look forward to getting to know you!



Also, feel free to check out why:


* Business Insider named us an "enterprise startup to bet your career on"
* Forbes' Cloud 100 recognized us as one of the top 100 private cloud companies in the world
* Deloitte Tech Fast 500 ranked us as the 17th fastest growing tech company in the Bay Area, and 96th in North America
* Quartz ranked us the #1 best company for remote workers
**Responsibilities**
====================



We are looking for an exceptional Customer Success Manager to join our growing team. In this role, you will own a portfolio of assigned accounts that may vary in market size, industry, and complexity, with a focus on ensuring value realization through the use of Workato platform, increasing adoption across variety of business and functional units, ensuring retention, supporting growth, and overall customer satisfaction.



 In this role, you will also be responsible to:


* Develop a strong command of Workato's unique value propositions, the business value our key capabilities drive, our approach to Enterprise Automation, Orchestration and AI , and our customer use-cases/success stories as well as our best practices. Leverage the aforementioned knowledge to guide the customer on their Enterprise Orchestration & AI journey and help them think differently. Work with customers on building out the AI roadmap
* Develop and maintain strategic business relationships with enterprise customers to drive adoption, assess and evangelize value received, and assist in revenue expansion. Establish regular touchpoints with the assigned customers per established practices, to review progress against strategic business and technical product objectives.
* Develop and maintain engagement with senior customer executives to understand their strategic objectives and position Workato for their transformation initiatives, including delivery of Customer Objectives reviews, Exec Business reviews, etc.
* Develop a deep understanding of a customer's business, use cases, and desired outcomes in order to guide them to achieve these via Workato's product and services. Develop and drive programs to increase usage of the product within the current (landed) group and expand usage to other business groups/functions.
* Create customer assets, including Joint Success Plan, to be leveraged by our sponsors that outline progress with Workato mapped to their business initiatives, value, deployment plans, etc.
* Monitor customers' achievement of desired outcome and value, consistently and effectively telling the story of these both to internal stakeholders and externally to key customer stakeholders.
* Be the expert in deployment models and governance structures and share best practices from a business and technical perspective.
* Serve as the primary point of escalation when customer issues arise, and effectively prioritize and orchestrate resolution of customer requests or issues.
* Develop trusted and collaborative relationships with internal stakeholders and business partners; and champion customers internally in order to mitigate risk, improve customer experience, drive to value outcomes, and unlock growth.
* Professionally manage your book of business and provide periodic and accurate reporting, develop growth and mitigation plans, following our best-practices and documentation requirement.
* Contribute to the development of Customer Success practice, develop playbooks, and drive process innovation and operational efficiency.
* Run hackathons and bootcamps to drive product adoption and consumption.
* Actively engage in sales activities to drive revenue growth and customer expansion.

**Requirements**
================


### **Qualifications / Experience / Technical Skills**


* BS or equivalent technical education. MBA a plus
* 5 + years of professional experience in consulting, customer success, client relationship or technical account management roles with a demonstrated track record of increasing adoption, revenue retention and driving NRR Growth. Prior experience as a Sr CSM or Account Manager or Sales Executive in a large PaaS preferred. Experience managing a portfolio of enterprise accounts, with account ARR ranging from ~$100k to multi-million ARR across the Forbes Global 2000 companies.
* Track record of successfully navigating ambiguity, building consensus, fostering accountability, and working with urgency to deliver customer outcomes.
* Strong written and oral presentation skills, with the ability to effectively engage both business and technical stakeholders (from Developer to C-level).
* Confidence in serving multiple customer stakeholders and working to build communities of champions/advocates across large organizations.
* Experience in Integration and/or business automation. Awareness of processes and roles in these domains would be a plus; People (HR), Finance, Marketing, Sales, and Post Sales Customer Organizations
* Prior Experience in Digital Transformation and/or consulting firms preferred.

### **Soft Skills / Personal Characteristics**


* Ability to develop an understanding of large complex businesses & Mid market customers with many stakeholders. Ability to build relationships across levels within customers
* Strong sense of customer empathy and customer-centricity.
* Grit and resilience to manage occasional tough & complex situations.
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
* Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking.
* Storytelling skills.
* Entrepreneurial drive and comfort working in ambiguous, quickly-changing environments.
* A passion for and belief in the power of automation to drive business value.
* Have a keen intellectual curiosity, detailed orientation, and possess analytical abilities.
* Passion for technology, enjoy learning new solutions and capabilities, and translating these into solutions that drive business value for customers.
* Be a self-motivated team player who loves to drive Impact beyond their current role

**(REQ ID: 2349)**

title: Head of Engineering
description:
Stockholm Hybrid
  
  

At DigitalRoute, we are passionate about helping the world’s leading enterprises unlock the value of their usage data. Our products are deployed globally and trusted by major brands to enable digital transformation, drive innovation, and deliver business-critical insights. We are now looking for an inspiring and visionary Head of Engineering to lead our distributed engineering organization into the next phase of growth.
  
  

As Head of Engineering, you will lead and scale a global engineering organization responsible for DigitalRoute’s product portfolio, including public cloud/SaaS (Usage Cloud), private cloud (Usage Cloud, Private Edition), and our on-premises solution (MediationZone). You will oversee 60+ engineers across multiple locations (notably Sweden and Malaysia), manage 8+ scrum teams, and directly lead both engineering managers and lead architects. With a budget exceeding 60 million SEK, you will ensure our teams deliver high-quality, innovative solutions aligned with the company’s strategic direction.
  
  

This is a unique opportunity to shape the future of our engineering culture, technology vision, and business operations - driving impact at scale.
  
  

What you'll do
  
  

People & Organization
  
  

Lead, manage, and grow a distributed engineering organization (60+ engineers, 8+ scrum teams).
  
Continue the transformation of ways of working, leveraging AI tools and fostering a tech-forward, innovative, and customer-focused culture.
  
Foster an inclusive, high-performing culture across geographies and time zones
  
Drive resource planning, recruitment, and retention of top engineering talent.
  
Coach and develop engineering managers, lead architects and teams, to build leadership capabilities and career growth for technical talent.
  
Continuously improve engineering processes and ways of working, focusing on innovation, AI adoption, quality, predictability, and delivery.
  
Ensure all team members understand company and product strategy, fostering autonomy aligned with business objectives.
  
Act as the spokesperson for Engineering, communicating activities and achievements to the wider organization and stakeholders.
  
  

Technology Vision & Execution
  
  

Build strong partnerships with Product Management to ensure alignment on product vision, architecture, and delivery.
  
Stay ahead of technological trends and champion innovation, fostering a culture of continuous learning.
  
Drive the acquisition and development of modern skills (e.g., Artificial Intelligence, data techniques) to support product directions
  
Evolve development practices (Agile, Scrum, CI/CD, cloud-native technologies) to match or surpass industry standards.
  
Ensure product quality, performance, and technical excellence across all engineering deliverables.
  
  

Business Operations
  
  

Manage and optimize the engineering budget to maximize value delivery and team effectiveness.
  
Foster visibility and predictability in development operations; set and track relevant KPIs, regularly reporting key metrics to stakeholders and executive management.
  
Leverage data analytics to inform engineering strategies, measure performance, and identify areas for improvement.
  
Collaborate with stakeholders across Product Management, Quality, Release Management, and Customer Success to ensure engineering priorities align with business goals and customer needs.
  
Represent Engineering in customer or partner engagements or escalations, particularly with senior technical stakeholders at large enterprise clients.
  
  

What you'll bring
  
  

Experience & Skills
  
  

Proven experience as a leader of leaders, managing medium to large engineering teams across multiple locations and time zones.
  
Passionate about technology, able to articulate an innovative vision of how AI is profoundly changing the world of software development.
  
Deep, hands-on technical background in software development; essential to establish credibility with engineering teams and technical decision-making.
  
Pragmatic decision-maker with the ability to drive consensus and rally teams behind common goals.
  
Strong sense of ownership, accountability, and pride in product quality and delivery.
  
Holistic approach to problem-solving, considering business impact, resource constraints, and long-term implications.
  
**Strong track record in modern development practices:** CI/CD, code quality tools (e.g., Sonarqube, Jenkins, Jira), cloud-native infrastructure (Kubernetes, Docker, AWS/GCP/Azure).
  
Experience driving change in mature organizations, especially around quality, automation, and ways of working.
  
Ability to translate business goals into engineering priorities and communicate effectively across technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  
Experience in international, diverse environments; adept at managing distributed teams and fostering inclusion.
  
Familiarity with setting up and managing business contracts with suppliers.
  
Demonstrated ability to manage substantial budgets and optimize resource allocation.
  
  

Qualifications
  
  

Master’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
  
10+ years’ experience in software, as Head of Engineering or Engineering Manager, managing managers with large distributed teams, building great products in a SaaS and/or enterprise software environment.
  
  

DigitalRoute is committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse environment, and we actively encourage qualified candidates of all genders, sexual orientations, ethnicities, disabilities, and ages to apply. Join our global and diverse company, where our differences are our strengths.
  
  

We follow a continuous selection process, and the position may be filled before the last application date.
  
  

Ready to lead and inspire at scale?
  
Apply today and help us shape the future of usage data at DigitalRoute!
  
  

We look forward to receiving your application!
  
  

We care
  
  

We team up
  
  

We are covered
  
  

We work our way
  
  

We invest in parenthood
  
  

We create our destiny
  
  

ABOUT THE COMPANY
  
  

DigitalRoute processes data about how customers use digital services. Our software is used by telecoms, streaming services, SaaS companies, and many others. Why does this data matter? Data about usage helps companies send accurate invoices, improve customer experiences, and control how much of a service is used. It even helps companies create entirely new services based on customer behavior. We help some of the world’s most iconic brands shift to subscription and usage-based services.
  
  

Everyone makes a differen
  
We believe in the individual. We are not just saying it but knowing that everyone makes a difference. Being a relatively small company with a flat organization, people here have room to influence, be visible and make a real difference. We want people to feel empowered to raise opinions, drive initiatives and take ownership.
  
  

Big-hearted across the wo
  
We have a soul of a small and big-hearted team working together across the globe. Here, it is as natural to work with someone hundreds of miles away as with someone sitting next to you. And we do it together as one team. We actively strive for an environment where everyone feels included and valued.
  
  

Dedicated to succeed.
  
We are a growth company with high ambitions, chosen by the most iconic brands in the world. With a true passion for our customers, we constantly go after new grounds to be at the forefront of what we do. We provide the possibilities to grow in a culture where flexibility, courage, and dedication to succeed take us to the next level.
  
  

Fares Fares

### **Description & Requirements**

**Are you passionate about improving how businesses work and creating user-friendly solutions that make a real difference? Do you enjoy collaborating with others and bringing fresh ideas to the table? If so, this could be the perfect role for you!** **Location: Stockholm or Linköping** **A Typical Day in This Role** **As part of our team, you’ll:*** Shape Great Experiences: Work closely with colleagues and customers to understand what they need and help design user experience solutions that work seamlessly. We are developing the User Interface for M3, and tools like Experience Designer. With a touch of GenAI we are aiming at giving all M3 users a smooth and efficient experience.
* Support Growth & Improvement: Test new ideas, solve problems, and document your progress to ensure everything runs smoothly.
* Write and Test: Create user-friendly documentation to help others understand our solutions and conduct thorough tests to ensure they work perfectly.
* Be a Problem-Solver: Help identify and fix issues, ensuring our solutions are as effective as possible.
* Collaborate Across Borders: Connect with team members in Sweden, Poland, and Manila, as well as customers and partners around the world.
* Learn & Share Knowledge: Stay curious, explore new ideas, and help the team grow stronger together.
 **What We’re Looking For** **We’re looking for someone who:*** Has Experience: You’ve worked with M3, either as a consultant or within a company that uses it, or maybe you have a development background?
* Cares About Users: You’re passionate about creating easy-to-use solutions.
 **What Would Be Great to Have** **While not required, we’d love it if you also:*** Love Creative Problem-Solving: Have experience tailoring solutions to meet unique customer needs.
* Enjoy Exploring Tools: Have worked with tools that help build or personalize user experiences.
  

- **Why You’ll Love Working With Us**
Make a difference for all users around the world who are using M3 every day to perform their work.
✨ Flexibility: Enjoy a hybrid work environment with a balance of office and remote work.
 Global Collaboration: Be part of a team that connects and works across different countries and cultures.
 Continuous Growth: Expand your skills and knowledge in an environment that values learning.
 Share Your Impact: Present your ideas and projects in webinars, showcasing your creativity and expertise. **Let’s Build the Future Together**  

If you’re ready to take on exciting challenges and make a difference, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today and join our innovative team!  


  

**About Infor**  

Infor is where ambition meets impact. Join a global community of bold thinkers and innovators, where your expertise doesn’t just solve problems. it shapes industries, unlocks opportunities, and creates real-world impact for billions of people. At Infor, you’re not just building a career. you’re helping to build what’s next.  

Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business-wide digital transformation.  

For more information visit www.infor.com  


**Our Values**  

At Infor, we strive for an environment that is founded on a business philosophy called Principle Based Management™ (PBM™) and eight Guiding Principles: integrity, stewardship & compliance, transformation, principled entrepreneurship, knowledge, humility, respect, self-actualization.  

We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on PBM™. Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM™ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.  

Infor is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment. Infor does not discriminate against candidates or employees because of their sex, race, gender identity, disability, age, sexual orientation, religion, national origin, veteran status, or any other protected status under the law. If you require accommodation or assistance at any time during the application or selection processes, please submit a request by following the directions located in the FAQ section. **Fraud Awareness**

title: Vi söker vår nästa Teamchef inom Cloud (GCP/Azure)
description:
Arbetsuppgifter
Vi söker dig som är en erfaren mjukvaruutvecklare och molnarkitekt **inom GCP** eller **Azure** med en passion för att bygga framtidssäkra lösningar och inspirera andra. I rollen kombinerar du arbete som konsult med en roll som teamchef, en roll där du hjälper både kunder och kollegor att bli framgångsrika. Cirka 20% av din tid roll innefattar att växa, inspirera och utveckla ditt team och verksamheten i södra Sverige tillsammans med övriga individer i den lokala ledningsgruppen. Resterande tid möjliggör du våra kunder att bli lyckosamma i sina molntransformationer på olika sätt! En roll för en multikonstnär med starkt självledarskap och erfarenhet av att leda team och leveranser.


**Forefront:**

Sedan 2008 har vi vuxit till över 550 kollegor med en mångfald av erfarenheter och kompetens inom managementkonsulting, design och mjukvaruutveckling. Vi finns på 11 kontor i Sverige och sedan 2024, även i USA.


Vi strävar efter att bli Sveriges bästa arbetsplats genom att uppskatta våra olikheter, ständigt blicka framåt och skapa en organisation som är lika modig som klok. Vår övertygelse är att tekniken ger oss oanade möjligheter – för att utveckla människor, skapa bättre affärer och bygga hållbara samhällen.


Vi drivs av att förena människa och teknik och med gemensamma visioner och större ambitioner, stödjer vi en bred kundkrets på deras digitaliseringsresor. Genom våra nära partnerskap med Google och Microsoft ligger vi i teknisk framkant och erbjuder utmärkta förutsättningar för att hjälpa våra kunder med deras digitaliseringsprojekt.


**Dina ansvarsområden:**

* Designa och implementera skalbara, distribuerade och kvalitativa system som drar nytta av PaaS-tjänster och de unika fördelarna med hyperscalers som GCP och Azure. För att prata klarspråk, du hjälper och möjliggör kunder bli lyckosamma i deras nyttjande av en plattform under olika delar av en molntransformation.
* Säkerställa att våra kunder får rätt lösningar för just deras situation genom att dra nytta av din och vår insyn i Google och Microsofts tekniska utveckling.
* Vara en möjliggörare som bygger vidare på ett erfaret team och stöttar nya förmågor, exempelvis inom vårt traineeprogram.
* Bidra till affärsutveckling och rekrytering i Region Syd (Malmö, Halmstad, Växjö).
* Delta i den operativa ledningsgruppen för regionen och bidra till våra strategiska mål.

**Vi letar efter dig som:**

* Har erfarenhet av att bygga moderna, komplexa och distribuerade system med fokus på kvalitet, prestanda och skalbarhet.
* Har djup erfarenhet av att nyttja PaaS-tjänster och designa lösningar som optimerar fördelarna med hyperscalers som GCP och Azure.
* Vill ligga i teknisk framkant och använda vår nära relation och partnerskap med Google och Microsoft för att skapa innovativa lösningar.
* Är konsultmässig, och därmed nyfiken, positiv, modig, pragmatisk, flexibel, framåtlutad, samt trivs i framåtlutade produktorganisationer. Har ledarerfarenhet eller en stark vilja att utvecklas inom ledarskap.
* Kommunicerar väl på svenska och engelska, sprider energi och skapar trivsel omkring dig.

Kvalifikationer
**Vi erbjuder:**


* Möjligheten att forma kultur och gemenskap i en växande region.
* Stark vidareutveckling av dina nuvarande förmågor inom teknik, affär och ledarskap
* Tillgång till tekniska insikter och innovation genom våra partnerskap med Google och Microsoft.
* Stöd i din personliga och professionella utveckling, med tillgång till coaching, utbildningar och nätverk.
* Flexibla arbetstider och fokus på work-life balance.
* En arbetsplats där vi stöttar, firar och utvecklar varandra.
* En kombination av fast lön och resultatbaserad ersättning.
Vi är ett stöttande, varmt och framåtsträvande team som tror på att göra riktiga avtryck – både för våra kunder och varandra. Är du vår nästa ledare och kollega?

Om företaget
Forefront Consulting är ett verksamhets- och IT-konsultbolag med drygt 550 anställda. Med kontor på 11 orter i Sverige och USA, guidar vi företag och organisationer i det digitala landskapet och övriga transformationer.



Oavsett om uppdraget avser affärsverksamhet, teknologiska plattformar eller designlösningar är utgångspunkten alltid att först skapa en samsyn kring nödvändiga förändringar för att sedan kunna realisera dessa på bästa sätt för avsedd effekt.
